issue.title: [Java] Failed Arrow Memory - Core on big-endian platform
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9681](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9681). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The following two errors occur on a big-endian platform.


```java

% mvn -B -Drat.skip=true -Dorg.slf4j.simpleLogger.log.org.apache.maven.cli.transfer.Slf4jMavenTransferListener=warn -Dflatc.download.skip=true -rf :arrow-memory-core test
...
```
